name: Tank Battle Storm
description:
Fast paced 3D tank action on your IOS device. Take out your enemies with cannons, heat seekers, and howitzers.
"Tank Battle Storm is a fun, simple game that evolves the concept" - Slide To Play
FEATURES:
* Battle tanks over 40 levels
* Campaign game modes
* 4 weapons to choose from
* 5 types of AI tanks to fight against
* Support for HD devices and tablets
